short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fill in form details from a linked CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you have a CSV file with a list of Postcodes and ID numbers, this extension can read those from a remote file and autofill those details into a form on the page.
